```{r}
bookings <- read.csv("bookings.csv")
str(bookings)
summary(bookings)
```
```{r}
model1 <- lm(is_canceled ~ lead_time+ adults+ children+ babies + distribution_channel+is_repeated_guest+previous_cancellations+deposit_type, data = bookings   )
summary(model1)

bookings$babies <- as.factor(bookings$babies)
bookings$children <- as.factor(bookings$children)
bookings$children <- as.factor(bookings$children)
bookings$meal <- as.factor(bookings$meal)
bookings$meal <- as.factor(bookings$meal)
bookings$meal <- as.factor(bookings$meal)

model2 <- lm(booking_changes ~  arrival_date_month+lead_time+adults+ children+babies+meal+distribution_channel+reserved_room_type+customer_type, data = bookings)
summary(model2)
```
